title: Ritual Staff
content:
Location & Where to Find

Location: Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Grat The Trader at the Goblin Camp. Dropped by: Novice Gnat

Ritual Staff Notes & Tips

Not all items will be sold at the same time. Leveling up or completing a Long Rest will reset the shop and potenially show different items. Rarity: Common Value: 10 Gp. Weight: 2 Kg. ID: ??

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Fl
